quotes.message: Change is inevitable in life. You can either resist it and potentially get run over by it, or you can choose to cooperate with it, adapt to it, and learn how to benefit from it.
quotes.name: Jack Canfield

quotes.message: It is not the strongest or the most intelligent who will survive but those who can best manage change.
quotes.name: Charles Darwin

quotes.message: All changes, even the most longed for, have their melancholy, for what we leave behind us is a part of ourselves; we must die to one life before we can enter into another.
quotes.name: Anatole France

quotes.message: You must welcome change as the rule but not as your ruler.
quotes.name: Denis Waitley

quotes.message: Incredible change happens in your life when you decide to take control of what you do have power over instead of craving control over what you don't.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: Embrace uncertainty. Some of the most beautiful chapters in our lives won't have a title until much later.
quotes.name: Bob Goff

quotes.message: Look for solutions, instead of being difficult; be more thoughtful, instead of allowing anger to burn you out. Look at things from a different perspective, embrace change, look out for opportunities and you will feel much more in control.
quotes.name: Steve Backley

quotes.message: The art of life is a constant readjustment to our surroundings.
quotes.name: Kakuzo Okakaura

quotes.message: It takes a lot of courage to release the familiar and seemingly secure, to embrace the new. There is more security in the adventurous and exciting, for in movement there is life, and in change there is power.
quotes.name: Alan Cohen

quotes.message: Change the changeable, accept the unchangeable, and remove yourself from the unacceptable.
quotes.name: Denis Waitley

quotes.message: Getting over a painful experience is much like crossing monkey bars. You have to let go at some point in order to move forward.
quotes.name: C.S. Lewis

quotes.message: Embrace change. Envision what could be, challenge the status quo, and drive creative destruction.
quotes.name: Charles Koch

quotes.message: What is magical and mystifying to me about style is not that by seeing we can believe.
quotes.name: Stacy London

quotes.message: I think the growth of the brain is a slow process. But you do change and the more you accept change and embrace change, the better.
quotes.name: Diane Keaton

quotes.message: Life happens. Adapt. Embrace change, and make the most of everything that comes your way.
quotes.name: Nick Jonas

quotes.message: Fear stagnation; embrace change.
quotes.name: Debasish Mridha

quotes.message: You can live your dreams if you can embrace change. It's by taking chances that you'll learn how to be brave.
quotes.name: Nikita Koloff

quotes.message: Clinging to the past is the problem. Embracing change is the answer.
quotes.name: Gloria Steinem

quotes.message: Embrace change, even when the change slaps you in the face.
quotes.name: Walter Breuning

quotes.message: Buddhism teaches you to embrace change.
quotes.name: Koo Stark

quotes.message: We cannot become what we want by remaining what we are.
quotes.name: Max Depree

quotes.message: Growth means change and change involves risks, stepping from the known to the unknown.
quotes.name: George Shinn

quotes.message: You cannot control what happens to you, but you can control your attitude toward what happens to you, and in that, you will be mastering change rather than allowing it to master you
quotes.name: Brian Tracy

quotes.message: Embrace change. True success can be defined by your ability to adapt to changing circumstances.
quotes.name: Connie Sky

quotes.message: A lot of people resist transition and therefore never allow themselves to enjoy who they are. Embrace the change, no matter what it is; once you do, you can learn about the new world you're in and take advantage of it.
quotes.name: Nikke Giovanni

quotes.message: Time when learning how to learn (and unlearn) is central to success. Instead of hiding from change, let's embrace it. Each time we try something new, we get better at getting better. Experience builds competence and confidence, so we're ready for the big changes, like re-thinking what we do.
quotes.name: Peter Morville

quotes.message: If we can recognize that change and uncertainty are basic principles, we can greet the future and the transformation we are undergoing with the understanding that we do not know enough to be pessimistic.
quotes.name: Hazel Henderson

quotes.message: As self-governing entities, artists have a profound interest in change. Embracing change, we embrace growth and we embrace our future.
quotes.name: Robert Genn

quotes.message: Resistance is never the agent of change. You have to embrace the actions that are going to get you closer to your goal.
quotes.name: Ali Vincent

quotes.message: We cannot change what we are not aware of, and once we are aware, we cannot help but change.
quotes.name: Sheryl Sandberg

quotes.message: I cannot say whether things will get better if we change; what I can say is they must change if they are to get better.
quotes.name: Georg C. Lichtenberg

quotes.message: Every generation is gonna keep changing, and you just have to embrace the change.
quotes.name: Wyclef Jean

quotes.message: To improve is to change; to be perfect is to change often.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: We cannot become what we need to be, by remaining what we are.
quotes.name: Max Depree

quotes.message: Some people don't like change, but you need to embrace change if the alternative is disaster.
quotes.name: Elon Musk

quotes.message: Adaptability is not imitation. It means power of resistance and assimilation.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: If we don't change, we don't grow. If we don't grow, we are not really living.
quotes.name: Gail Sheehy

quotes.message: When in doubt, choose change.
quotes.name: Lily Leung

quotes.message: Life is about change. Sometimes it's painful. Sometimes it's beautiful. But most of the time, it's both.
quotes.name: Lana Lang

quotes.message: Change has long been a fearful thing for human beings ... and at the same time, it is our most Divine opportunity. Clinging to the banks of the river may seem safe and more secure, but life's possibilities are truly engaged only when we trust, release and become part of The Flow of the Universe.
quotes.name: Chelle Thompson

quotes.message: Your desire to change must be greater than your desire to stay the same.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Life belongs to the living, and he who lives must be prepared for changes.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: Don't fear change - embrace it.
quotes.name: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quotes.message: Become a student of change. It is the only thing that will remain constant.
quotes.name: Anthony D'Angelo

quotes.message: Only the wisest and stupidest of men never change.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: Worry less, smile more, accept criticism, take responsibility, listen & love, don't hate, Embrace change and feel good anyway.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: The moment that judgment stops through acceptance of what it is, you are free of the mind. You have made room for love, for joy, for peace.
quotes.name: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.message: Life is a series of natural and spontaneous changes. Don't resist them; that only creates sorrow. Let reality be reality. Let things flow naturally forward in whatever way they like.
quotes.name: Lao Tzu

quotes.message: Embracing change is never easy. But the reward for doing so can be far greater than you can ever imagine.
quotes.name: Kenneth Johnson

quotes.message: I'm human. I'm flawed. But I embrace change... and enhancement. Now there's nothing I can't do. Nothing. Nothing I can't know. Nothing I can't be. I want you to listen to something.
quotes.name: Shirow Masamune

quotes.message: He evolved; he embraced change, because he always wanted to be better than he was.
quotes.name: Gene Roddenberry

quotes.message: Embracing change brings us everyday wisdom, suggestions, and lessons to find the power inside to improve the quality of our lives and get through the difficult times.
quotes.name: Joseph F. Sica

quotes.message: If you are ready to shape your destiny and change your life to have a more fulfilling career, economic freedom, or more passionate relationships, then you have to embrace change.
quotes.name: Franklin A. Ohiozebau

quotes.message: To be constantly happy and wise, you must be prepared to and even embrace change.
quotes.name: D. Brewer

quotes.message: Embrace change enjoy today.
quotes.name: Allen Klein

quotes.message: If you change the future, you change the past. It keeps changing? Change is constant.
quotes.name: Jun Eishima

quotes.message: Embrace change. Keep your eyes on the prize. Keep moving in the direction where doors of opportunities are opened.
quotes.name: Beverley Childs

quotes.message: Don't fight change. Stop trying to hold on what is lost. Let go of the old and make room for the new. Time to make adjustments by recognizing when a season has ended. It's time to do it bigger than ever.
quotes.name: Beverley Childs

quotes.message: In order to renew our life's we must be willing to change and leave behind the things and people that compromise our happiness.
quotes.name: Beverley Childs

quotes.message: The biggest inhibitor to change lies within yourself, and that nothing gets better until you change.
quotes.name: Spencer Johnson

quotes.message: To exist is to change, to change is to mature, to mature is to go on creating oneself endlessly.
quotes.name: Allen Klein

quotes.message: One never lose time in vainly regretting the past or in complaining against the changes which cause us discomfort, for change is the essence of life.
quotes.name: Allen Klein

quotes.message: If a rock is in the way, the root of a tree will change its direction. The dumbest animals try to adapt themselves to changed conditions. Even a rat will change tactics to get a piece of cheese.
quotes.name: Melvin B. Tolson

quotes.message: The first step toward change is acceptance... Change is not something you do, it's something you allow.
quotes.name: Will Garcia

quotes.message: Each new season grows from the leftovers from the past. That is the essence of change, and change is the basic law.
quotes.name: Hal Borland

quotes.message: We must embrace change.
quotes.name: Sharon Halliday

quotes.message: Embracing change is having an open mind, soul, spirit and heart of reason and reasoning.
quotes.name: Dr. James J. Krieger D.D.

quotes.message: Change is not easy. But it is simple. Things will always change. We don't have a choice about that, but we do have a choice on how we react to change; and as a leader whether or not we choose to create change. The choice is really boils down to this. Either we manage change, or it will manage us.
quotes.name: Tom Feltenstein

quotes.message: When we resist change, it's called suffering. But when we can completely let go and not struggle against it, when we can embrace the groundlessness of our situation and relax into its dynamic quality, that's called enlightenment, or awakening to our true nature, to our fundamental goodness.
quotes.name: Pema Chodron

quotes.message: To embrace change, however, and actually welcome challenges that force you to personally grow, is a way to let go of the anger that a mistrusting situation left you with.
quotes.name: Jessica E. Smith

quotes.message: Learning the hard way, to embrace change.
quotes.name: Jessica E. Smith

quotes.message: Embrace change by viewing each collaborative opportunity and project as an opportunity to challenge yourself, thereby gleaning experience and knowledge.
quotes.name: Melissa Merz

quotes.message: We can embrace the challenges and changes in our lives, and discover the seeds of courage, wisdom, and joy that lie within us, waiting to blossom.
quotes.name: Melissa Merz

quotes.message: Embracing change is a matter of timing and knowledge, vision and guts.
quotes.name: Jay Conrad Levinson

quotes.message: Everything is change. Embrace that. Flow with it.
quotes.name: Ryan Holiday
